com.complexible.common.protocols.server

Class ServerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.protocols.server.ServerOptions

  • public final class ServerOptions
extends Object

    Server configuration options

    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.1.2
    Author:
    Michael Grove
    See Also:
    Server, ServerFactory

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static com.complexible.common.base.Option<String> KEY_STORE
      The path to the key store to be used for SSL.

      static com.complexible.common.base.Option<String> KEY_STORE_TYPE
      The type for the key store.
      static com.complexible.common.base.Option<Boolean> SECURITY_DISABLED
      Disables ALL security for a server
      static com.complexible.common.base.Option<Boolean> SSL_ENABLED
      Option to enable SSL for the server.
      static com.complexible.common.base.Option<Boolean> SSL_REQUIRED
      Option to require SSL; this will force clients to use SSL if they with to obtain a connection to the server.

    • Field Detail

      • SSL_ENABLED

        public static final com.complexible.common.base.Option<Boolean> SSL_ENABLED
        Option to enable SSL for the server. When this option is true, the server will support clients connecting over SSL

      • SSL_REQUIRED

        public static final com.complexible.common.base.Option<Boolean> SSL_REQUIRED
        Option to require SSL; this will force clients to use SSL if they with to obtain a connection to the server. This implicitly enables SSL

      • KEY_STORE

        public static final com.complexible.common.base.Option<String> KEY_STORE
        The path to the key store to be used for SSL. Defaults to the value of the JVM property javax.net.ssl.keyStore

      • KEY_STORE_PASSWD

        public static final com.complexible.common.base.Option<char[]> KEY_STORE_PASSWD
        The password for the key store. Defaults to the value of the JVM property javax.net.ssl.keyStorePassword

      • KEY_STORE_TYPE

        public static final com.complexible.common.base.Option<String> KEY_STORE_TYPE
        The type for the key store. Defaults to the value of the JVM property javax.net.ssl.keyStoreType and if that is not set, then it defaults to JKS

      • SECURITY_DISABLED

        public static final com.complexible.common.base.Option<Boolean> SECURITY_DISABLED
        Disables ALL security for a server

    • Method Detail

      • defaults

        public static com.complexible.common.base.Options defaults()

      • secure

        public static com.complexible.common.base.Options secure()
        Return the options for creating a 'secure' server, SSL is both enabled and required.
        Returns:
        the options

      • isSSLEnabled

        public static boolean isSSLEnabled(com.complexible.common.base.Options theOptions)
